Articles.Content: 699: Gravity starts decreasing
700: Gravity starts increasing
701: How many floors must a man walk up to...
Floor 702: A couch. You sit here for hours, resting your legs
Floor 703: You discover a paradox: How is it that in 630 posts you are already on floor 703?

(Bumpski!)

Floor 704: You meet a corpulent Kerbal, you poke it's stomach to see if it jiggles.
Floor 705: You take a peek out the window, vomit from the incredible height, and continue.
Floor 706: i wave at Gordon Freeman killing combine
Floor 707: Well, this is odd. The floor is gone, and you somehow make it up to Floor 708.
Floor 708: You realize you've made a huge mistake, by walking into where Jebediah keeps his SRBs.
Floor 709: You see dead bodies, and decide not to investigate further.
Floor 710: You suddenly wonder why you didn't bother taking the elevator up the building. Upon looking down, your calves are on fire.

Floor 711: Thankfully, you stumble through the door into this room, which happens to be a pool room, (yes on the 711th floor cause why not) which puts out your calves so you can continue on comfortably.
Floor 712: You are forced to walk on hot charcoal. The effects of the pool are undone!
Floor 713: Apparently it rains in this room... you are cooled from all this rain and are able to continue
Floor 714: You find a room full of Xbox ones... You are distracted and play a few games.
Floor 715: You find a room full of windows XP's. You cringe at the age of the computers, and walk on
Floor 716: Santa Kerman ruptures through the wall with his rocket-powered sleigh, screaming. You barely make it.
Floor 717 : There is a black monolith standing in a bright, white room.
Floor 718: Jack White is playing his song "I'm Shakin'" on a stage.
Floor 719: there is morgue that seems to be abandoned as the bodies in the cabinet appear to be turning to zombies although trapped
Floor 720: You discover a black hole is devouring the building, as you can see this is the last level.

Floor 721: You realize that nothing seems to be able to take this building down.

(Off topic: as per the rules, we can't have the "last floor," so we must continue upwards)
Floor 722: There is a dead kerbal in the corner, you shiver and move along.
Floor 723: A flock of inspectors are tied and gagged by the really tall tower mob because elevators are a legal requirement.
